definition: variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)
optic disk (terminal of the optic nerve on the retina)

sentences.english: There are myelinated and unmyelinated fibers in alligator's optic nerve.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，视神经中可见有髓纤维和无髓纤维。

sentences.english: KBP may promote regeneration of optic nerve axon after injury.
sentences.chinese: KBP在视神经损伤后可能促进了视神经的轴突再生。

sentences.english: KBP may promote regeneration of optic nerve axon after injury.
sentences.chinese: KBP在视神经损伤后可能促进了视神经的轴突再生。

sentences.english: But the stress and dryness are only temporary.
sentences.chinese: 但是视神经紧张和眼干都只是暂时的。

sentences.english: Glaucomatous optic nerve atrophy results from the abnormal intraocular pressure.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼性视神经萎缩由异常的眼内压所致。

sentences.english: Injection of macrophages and macrophage conditional medium can promote the optic nerve regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 注射巨噬细胞以及巨噬细胞调理液能促进视神经再生。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the early ultrastructural changes of the optic nerves after the brain impact injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究颅脑撞击伤早期视神经超微结构的改变。

sentences.english: Glaucoma is a potentially blinding illness that damages the optic nerve.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼是一种破坏视神经的潜在性致盲疾病。

sentences.english: Glaucoma is a group of diseases that cause damage to the optic nerve.
sentences.chinese: 青光眼是一组导致视神经损伤的疾病。

sentences.english: Increased pressure in the eye is linked to optic nerve damage.
sentences.chinese: 眼压的升高与视神经的损害密切相关。

sentences.english: Results Evulsion of optic nerve was one of the severe ocular trauma.
sentences.chinese: 结果视神经撕脱是一种严重的眼外伤，预后差。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the feasibility of nasal endoscopic approach technique in optic canal decompression.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻内窥镜在视神经管减压术中应用的可能性。

sentences.english: There were exposure keratopathy and pallor disc in the left eye.
sentences.chinese: 左眼有暴露性角膜炎及视神经苍白。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate the optic neuroprotection components of Erigeron breviscapus.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究灯盏细辛视神经保护的活性成分。

sentences.english: Objective To find a method for treating optic nerve canal fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的对治疗视神经管段损伤的新方法进行探讨。

sentences.english: Melanin also plays a role in the development of certain optical nerves.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素同时还在某些视神经的发育过程中发挥作用。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
ciliary body (in the eye, containing the focusing muscles)
